name: hyarcade
description: A full system for gathering and displaying peoples hypixel arcade games stats

scripts.build:config: cd packages/Config; git push; cd ../..;yarn add eatmyvenom/hyarcade-config
scripts.build:request: cd packages/request; git push; cd ../..;yarn add eatmyvenom/hyarcade-requests
scripts.build:logger: cd packages/Logger; git push; cd ../..;yarn add eatmyvenom/hyarcade-logger
scripts.build:struct: cd packages/Structures; git push; cd ../..;yarn add eatmyvenom/hyarcade-structures
scripts.build:utils: cd packages/Utils; git push; cd ../..;yarn add eatmyvenom/hyarcade-utils
scripts.build:pkgs: yarn run buildconfig; yarn run buildrequest; yarn run buildlogger; yarn run buildstruct; yarn run buildutils
scripts.build: yarn run lint; yarn run build:pkgs

author: EatMyVenom
